title: declarativeNetRequest.Rule
summary: The object describing the actions to take for matching requests. These can be specified in the static rule resources linked by the manifest.json's declarative_net_request key, or more dynamically through the declarativeNetRequest.updateDynamicRules or declarativeNetRequest.updateSessionRules methods.
